title: Index of Total Advertising for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Four Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1914-1943 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1943-1946 (3)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1944-1953 (4)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1953-1958. Indexes Of Advertising From"Printers' Ink" Have Been Changed To A 1935-1939 Base And The Seasonal Correction Factors Revised. The Average Index For 1942 Is 104.5 (Survey Of Current Business, April And May, 1944). Source: Survey Of Current Business

This NBER data series m06058b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 6 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter06.html.

NBER Indicator: m06058b
